description: The image shows a box with a snack inside. The box is located in the center of the image, and the snack is inside the box. The box has a red bounding box with coordinates [100, 87, 388, 408]. The snack has a bounding box with coordinates [200, 132, 316, 259].

objects.name: box
objects.location: The box is located in the center of the image. It's in the middle of the table. There are no objects around
objects.relationship: The box is inside the table
